remarks: Define subtraction.  Theorem ~ subval shows its value (and describes how this definition works), theorem ~ subaddi relates it to addition, and theorems ~ subcli and ~ resubcli prove its closure laws.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1994.)
statement:
df-sub $p |- - = ( x e. CC , y e. CC |-> ( iota_ z e. CC ( y + z ) = x ) ) $.
$d x y z $.
